reviews.review_msg: I enjoyed the class. I appreciated his quick and to-the-point teaching style. He basically presented what was needed without any extra. Had not attended a class with him prior to this, but would take another class with him. The homework seemed well related to his tests, which were fair.

Law&Econ - his lectures are fairly well organized with pdf slides. Sometimes hard to understand what he is saying. Textbook used by Friedman SUCKED, repetitive, long and confusing explanation of the concepts. Assignments were 'thinking-type' of question. Midterms were fair and final he marked easy. He marked on explanations. Overall I rate B.
